scene.line: I forget what became of the white one.
Her name was "Coconut," and she disappeared without a trace.
I wouldn't say "easy" â€” I had to leave food on the dock for a week before she'd come inside!
She only stuck around for a month or two. You probably saw quite a lot of her; I remember you were working nights then. She was a nocturnal creature.
